Name: Vicious Ancient Battle
Title: Vicious Ancient Battle
Desc: The god whom the people of Watatsumi Island once trusted fought a bitter battle against the ruler of Narukami...\nMusoujin Gorge, that yawning chasm in Yashiori Island, is the lasting scar of that conflict...

Talent.Name: Vicious Ancient Battle
Talent.Desc: The opposing active character loses 1 $[K310].\n(Only one {SPRITE_PRESET#3007} "Arcane Legend" card can be played per match. This card will be in your starting hand.)

K310.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>
K310.Desc: Characters must consume {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.\nWhen characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy.
